verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H5210>Nineveh.<s%> The <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H2377>vision<s%> of <S%H5151>Nahum<s%> the <S%H512>Elkoshite.<s%>

<S%H410>God<s%> is <S%H7072>jealous,<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5358>revenges;<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5358>revenges,<s%> and is <S%H1167>furious;<s%> <S%H2534><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will take <S%H5358>vengeance<s%> on his <S%H6862>adversaries,<s%> and he <S%H5201>reserves<s%> wrath for his <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H750>slow<s%> to <S%H639>anger,<s%> and <S%H1431>great<s%> in <S%H3581>power,<s%> and will not at all <S%H5352>acquit<s%> the wicked: the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has his <S%H1870>way<s%> in the <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%> and in the <S%H8183>storm,<s%> and the <S%H6051>clouds<s%> are the <S%H80>dust<s%> of his <S%H7272>feet.<s%>

He <S%H1605>rebukes<s%> the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and makes it <S%H3001>dry,<s%> and <S%H2717>dries<s%> up <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5104>rivers:<s%> <S%H1316>Bashan<s%> <S%H535>languishes,<s%> and <S%H3760>Carmel,<s%> and the <S%H6525>flower<s%> of <S%H3844>Lebanon<s%> <S%H535>languishes.<s%>

The <S%H2022>mountains<s%> <S%H7493>quake<s%> at him, and the <S%H1389>hills<s%> <S%H4127>melt,<s%> and the <S%H776>earth<s%> is <S%H5375>burned<s%> at his <S%H6440>presence,<s%> yes, the <S%H8398>world,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein.

<S%H4310>Who<s%> can <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> his <S%H2195>indignation?<s%> and <S%H4310>who<s%> can <S%H6965>abide<s%> in the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of his <S%H639>anger?<s%> his <S%H2534>fury<s%> is <S%H5413>poured<s%> out like <S%H784>fire,<s%> and the <S%H6697>rocks<s%> are <S%H5422>thrown<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> by him.
The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> is <S%H2896>good,<s%> a <S%H4581>strong<s%> <S%H4581>hold<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H6869>trouble;<s%> and he <S%H3045>knows<s%> them that <S%H2620>trust<s%> in him.

But with an <S%H5674>overrunning<s%> <S%H7858>flood<s%> he will <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H3617>utter<s%> <S%H3615>end<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> thereof, and <S%H2822>darkness<s%> shall <S%H7291>pursue<s%> his <S%H341>enemies.<s%>

<S%H4100>What<s%> do you <S%H2803>imagine<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD?<s%> he will <S%H6213>make<s%> an <S%H3617>utter<s%> <S%H3615>end:<s%> <S%H6869>affliction<s%> shall not <S%H6965>rise<s%> up the second <S%H6471>time.<s%>

For <S%H5704>while<s%> they be <S%H5440>entwined<s%> together as <S%H5518>thorns,<s%> and while they are <S%H5435>drunken<s%> as <S%H5435>drunkards,<s%> they shall be <S%H398>devoured<s%> as <S%H7179>stubble<s%> <S%H4390>fully<s%> <S%H3002>dry.<s%>
There is one <S%H3318>come<s%> out of you, that <S%H2803>imagines<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> a <S%H1100>wicked<s%> <S%H3289>counselor.<s%>

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H518>Though<s%> they be <S%H8003>quiet,<s%> and <S%H3651>likewise<s%> <S%H7227>many,<s%> yet <S%H3651>thus<s%> shall they be <S%H1494>cut<s%> down, when he shall <S%H5674>pass<s%> through. Though I have <S%H6031>afflicted<s%> you, I will <S%H6031>afflict<s%> you <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more.<s%>
For <S%H6258>now<s%> will I <S%H7665>break<s%> his <S%H4132>yoke<s%> from <S%H5921>off<s%> you, and will <S%H5423>burst<s%> your <S%H4147>bonds<s%> in sunder.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> has given a <S%H6680>commandment<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> you, that <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> of your <S%H8034>name<s%> be <S%H2232>sown:<s%> out of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of your <S%H430>gods<s%> will I <S%H3772>cut<s%> off the <S%H6459>graven<s%> <S%H6755>image<s%> and the <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H6755>image:<s%> I will <S%H7760>make<s%> your <S%H6913>grave;<s%> for you are <S%H7043>vile.<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold<s%> on the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> the <S%H7272>feet<s%> of him that <S%H1319>brings<s%> <S%H1319>good<s%> <S%H1319>tidings,<s%> that <S%H8085>publishes<s%> <S%H7965>peace!<s%> O <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H2287>keep<s%> your <S%H2282>solemn<s%> <S%H2282>feasts,<s%> <S%H7999>perform<s%> your <S%H5088>vows:<s%> for the <S%H1100>wicked<s%> shall <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3254>more<s%> <S%H5750><s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> through you; he is <S%H3605>utterly<s%> <S%H3772>cut<s%> off.
